name: Occultatum
description:
Occultatum (hidden in Latin) is a competitive historical multiplayer game set in ancient Roman times where two or more players hunt down a player who refused to pay their taxes. One player, The Old Man, is nearly dying, to secure his family's future he decides to bury his last money before the tax collector comes!

The Old Man has 5 minutes to stash as much of his money as possible, but if the tax collector(s) (known as publicani in Latin) find a stash, the Old Man looses the stash and the publicani get the stash.

The player(s) who have to most stashes hidden or in their possession at the end of the round win.
